entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as the one who is explaining the bewitched state of Durmstrang to Harry. She says that if a Muggle looks at it, they see only a moldering old ruin.

entities.name: durmstrang
entities.description: Durmstrang is mentioned as the school that has been bewitched by Hermione's friends. It is described as having Muggle-repelling charms and being Unplottable.

relationships.description: Hermione has bewitched Durmstrang, making it invisible to Muggles and difficult for foreign wizards to find.
